subject: Attention: Are You Alive?
body:
Attention: Are You Alive?
Regarding Your Payment
I am Mr. Amadou Jean-Jacques Chief Executive Officer and Managing
Director, the Crédit Mutuel du Sénégal. We have just newly inaugurated
World Debt Recovery committee (WDRC). The committee has a mandate to
recover unpaid debts associated with NNPC contracts, Lottery fund,
inheritance fund, loans and grants etc. ranging from $1M-$95.5M owed
to various beneficiaries and companies across the globe (Asia, Europe,
USA, Africa, and Australia) and submit the list of the unpaid
beneficiaries/companies to our affiliated correspondence paying bank
as approved by the United Nations Office for the Coordination of
Humanitarian Affairs in collaboration with United Nations Economic
Commission for Africa (UN/ECA)
In the course of the newly inaugurated World Debt Recovery committee
(WDRC) investigation, your email address/particulars were shortlisted
among the first fifteen individuals yet to be paid. However, we
received a petition from one Mrs. Christina Morgan that you are dead,
according to her, you died in a plane crash as such your payment funds
valued $7.5 million should be paid to her as your heir apparent and
next of kin, she also attached her receiving bank account details with
her petition.
To avoid paying the fund to erroneous individual/beneficiary, we have
decided to contact you for confirmation and clarification. Hence, if
we fail to hear from you within 72 banking hours, it will be assumed
that the petition of Mrs. Morgan is factual hence your payment funds
will be paid to her provided receiving bank account details without
further delay.
Therefore, should you be alive, we would like you to forward your full
personal information as required below:
(A) Full name and residential address
(B) Next of kin
(C) Occupation
(D) Nationality
(E) Telephone numbers
(F) Copy of your ID
Your urgent response is swiftly required because you have a limited
time to execute this payment.
Thanks.
Yours faithfully,
Mr. Amadou Jean-Jacques
CEO and Managing Director at Crédit Mutuel du Sénégal
Point E Rue De Fatick BP;
28052 Dakar Sénégal
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Crédit Mutuel du Sénégal. All Rights Reserved

subject: Re:   Attention: Are You Alive?
body:
Hello Mr. Adou,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, the news of my supposed demise is quite surprising! I assure you, I am very much alive and well.

I'm curious about this World Debt Recovery Committee (WDRC) that you mentioned. Could you tell me more about it? How does it operate and how was my email address selected?

Also, regarding Mrs. Christina Morgan's claim, I don't recall knowing anyone by that name. Is there any way to verify her claims or perhaps a way for me to prove that I am indeed alive?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Steven
